skills.skill: Security Orchestration and Automated Response (SOAR) Platforms

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform intrusion analysis using SIEM technology, packet captures, reports, data visualization, log analysis, and pattern analysis.
Act as the first responder to security events and escalations via email, phone, and tickets across corporate user networks, data centers, and cloud environments.
Assist in the remediation of all information security incidents.
Hunt for and identify threat actor groups and respective tactics, techniques, and procedures.
Document and communicate findings, escalate critical incidents, and interact with lines of business.
Improve and challenge existing processes and procedures in a very agile and fast-paced cyber security environment.
Keep current on the threat landscape and cyber security trends.
Adapt to fluid infrastructures and learn/support new technologies.
Be a thought leader around new security alert content creation, data correlation, anomaly thresholds, and logic updates.
Mentor the core analyst team with regards to training & escalation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent IT/Security industry experience (Master's preferred)
Industry recognized professional certifications such as Security+, CBROPS, CSA, CEH, GSEC, SSCP, CISSP, GBFA, GCDA, GCIA, GCIH, GMON, GNFA, GOSI, GPEN, GPPA, GREM, GSOC, OSDA, OSCP
